Show HN: Automation Tools for Community Builders

stories.text:
I'm starting a junior position at a company where I have interned at for the last year. I've requested for a work-machine, but was offered an older, weaker alternative than my personal MacBook (base model, 2015).

As a result, I've moved my development to a cloud environment so that it would lift some computing load. This, however, is not possible for graphical demanding programs such as Figma.

In the past year, I repeatedly had to work from home to compensate for my machine's shortcomings with my desktop. The company has now warned me not to work from home again.

What is the proper way to ask for a work-machine? What is the best course of action if the request is rejected again? Does it make sense to take out a loan to buy one myself?
stories.title: Ask HN: Are junior developers entitled to work machines?

stories.text:
This is the first application that I have built and it will always have a very special place in my heart. I know this is just the beginning of a new journey and there is so much more for me to learn and develop. Would love to hear some feedback and ideas on how I can improve this further. A quick short summary of what Picspanel is about is as follows.

Picspanel is the simplest pin creator for Pinterest! Create amazing and eye-striking pins superfast using Picspanel's user-friendly Pinterest templates! Get your brand social media images created in just minutes and have them ready to share today!
stories.title: Show HN: Picspanel – Simplest Pin Creator
